cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/modules/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED breakov_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "breakov_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(breakov_jucer_FILE
  "${breakov_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  JUCER_VERSION "4.3.1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${breakov_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "KVgx4q"
)

  BUILD_VST ON
  BUILD_VST3 OFF
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT ON
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT_V3 OFF
